column4: Question: does anyone know of a good way to graph HD information? preferably to a PHP page? I wanna monitor my HD health on my home server (besides webmin)
clarification to that would be a table for instance that shows HDtemp info, and disk usage
There is an app called Hard Disk Sentinel, however I'm not sure there's a package in Ubuntu for it
thanks, I'll look into that im not too scared of make install :)
